name: Waterfall
overview: In Nepal there is a mountain called Annapurna. ON its summit there are many lakes, but in its depths are a complex of caverns in cold rock. The peoples living in Rajistan Valley need the water, so Micro must quickly dig galleries to make the water fall down. Set detonators for exploding the rock to make waterfalls so the water falls to the accumulator. There is a time limit so work quickly. Published in Italvideo compilation release.
